name: Iron Targeting
desc:
Iron Shell operatives are required to be carefully analyzing their enemies who are often shielded with the best shielding technology can provide them. +%s damage to shields.

"For an impenetrable shield, stand inside yourself."

name: Prototype Point-Defense Core
desc: Extends the range of ballistic weapons by su. It just works.

name: Vengeance Core
desc: Reflects all missiles in a small radius. Successfully reflecting a missile supercharges the ship's vengeance core, improving shield efficiency. Failing to reflect any missiles will result in the vengeance core overloading, massively increasing damage received by shields and doubling shield radius.

name: Audacious Core
desc: Mini-Me for Audacious, get near a mommy vengeance uwu (NOT IMPLEMENTED YET)
